title: Glossary
text:
“Assignee: Organization(s) and individual(s) that have an ownership interest in the legal rights a patent offers”1
1 source: https://asklib.library.hbs.edu/faq/267606“Inventor: individual(s) who have contributed to the claimed invention. However, they may or may not have an ownership interest in the legal rights of the patent.”
“Applicant: Organization or individual that files the patent application is called the “applicant.” This could be the original inventor, or it could be the assignee.”
IPC: International Patent Classification
CPC: Cooperative Patent Classification

title: About
text: Capturing notes and pieces of knowledge around: https://patentsview.org/
